name: Evereden Kids Happy Face Duo
about: What it is: A face wash and cream that are safe for kids and tweens to cleanse, support, and protect changing skin..Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness.Highlighted Ingredients: - MegaVitamin Complex™: Combination of amino acids and omegas to nourish, hydrate, and soothe skin..- Niacinamide: Fights breakouts, reduces redness, nourishes..- Hyaluronic Acid: Helps visibly plump up dry skin by attracting and sealing in moisture...Ingredient Callouts: These products are also vegan and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: This set will help your kiddo build their own skincare routine with this safe and fun skincare set. This foamy face cleanser and hydrating face cream are infused with vitamins and amino acids to balance oiliness, clear blemishes, and improve skin's moisture barrier...This Set / Palette Contains: (delete one).- 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Kids Multi-Vitamin Face Cream - Cool Peach.- 1 oz/ 30 mL Kids Multi-Vitamin Face Wash - Cool Peach..Clinical Results: Based on a consumer study of 75 participants:.- 96% agreed hydrated skin.- 95% agreed effectively cleansed skin.- 91% agreed removed SPF
ingredients: -MegaVitamin Complex™: Combination of amino acids and omegas to nourish, hydrate, and soothe skin..-Niacinamide: Fights breakouts, reduces redness, nourishes..-Hyaluronic Acid: Helps visibly plump up dry skin by attracting and sealing in moisture...Kids Multi-Vitamin Face Wash:.Water (Aqua), Coco-Glucoside, Glycerin, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate,.1,2 Hexanediol, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Liquid Endosperm, Hydroxyacetophenone, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Lactococcus Ferment Lysate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Ceramide NP, Ascorbic Acid, Linoleic Acid†, Linolenic Acid†, Hyaluronic Acid, Inulin§, Fructose§, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Lactate, Sucrose Stearate, Citric Acid, Benzoic Acid, Fragrance (Parfum)...Kids Multi-Vitamin Face Cream:.Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Glyceryl Caprylate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Squalane, Niacinamide, Dimethicone, Ceramide NP, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lactobacillus Ferment, Ascorbic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Sodium Lactate, Sodium Gluconate, Panthenol, Caryodendron Orinocense Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Linoleic Acid, Proline, Hydroxyproline, Sodium PCA, Maltodextrin, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Cellulose Gum, Xanthan Gum, Benzoic Acid, Fragrance (Parfum).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Pump Kids Multi-Vitamin Face Wash into hand and massage onto wet skin. Rinse well and pat dry..-Gently massage a small amount of Kids Multi-Vitamin Face Cream onto dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Amazing for breakouts on a child
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My almost 10 year old daughter got these items for Xmas. She’s been having some puberty breakouts for a while now, within a few weeks of using these products her skin is almost completely clear. I was really surprised. We tried all the normal acne treatments and nothing was helping. This stuff is awesome and works quick. Plus she loves the smell of peaches!  Thank you for giving my daughter clear skin!
